import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.scss'], }) export class UsersComponent { users = [ { id: 123456, avatar: '', date: '21 June 2020, 12:42 AM', name: 'user name1', }, { id: 12457889, avatar: '', date: '21 June 2020, 12:42 AM', name: 'user name2', }, { id: 56784512, avatar: '', date: '21 June 2020, 12:42 AM', name: 'user name3', }, ]; }
